This document details an internship experience at Semtech, where the intern, Sheetal Patnaik, developed an automated system for generating Total Rewards Statements for employees across multiple countries. The project utilized AI and data science techniques, particularly Python programming, to enhance HR processes, improve operational efficiency, and provide better communication regarding employee compensation. The intern reflects on the skills gained, challenges faced, and the impact of the project on both the company and their future career in technology and data science [Source 1 p.6, Source 2 p.6, Source 4 p.2].
Sheetal Patnaik started her internship on 19th May 2025 [Source 1 p.1 c1].
The internship ended on 19th August 2025 [Source 4 p.1].
Sheetal Patnaik reported to Lori Kelley during her internship at Semtech [Source 1: Patnaik,Sheetal.pdf p.1 c1].
